neutron bomb 中子弹；中子辐射武器（等于neutron radiation weapon，N-bomb）

sentences.en: If the conditions are right, they will combine, fuse and form darmstadtium plus neutron.
sentences.cn: 如果条件合适，它们将结合、聚变，形成鐽中子。

sentences.en: Heavy water is heavy because the hydrogen in it weighs twice as much as ordinary hydrogen (it has a proton and a neutron in its nucleus, instead of just a proton).
sentences.cn: 重水之所以重是因为水中氢的重量是普通氢的两倍（它的原子核中有一个质子和一个中子，而不仅仅是一个质子）。

sentences.en: This work prepared the way for the discovery of the neutron by Sir James Chadwick and, above all, for the discovery in 1934 by Irène and Frédéric Joliot-Curie of artificial radioactivity.
sentences.cn: 这项工作为詹姆斯·查德威克爵士发现中子铺平了道路，尤其是为伊莲娜和弗雷德里克·约里奥特·居里在1934年发现人工放射性奠定了基础。
